com.example.rebunu

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.rebunu.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database we have 4 collections: profiles contains the information of the user; requests contains all the currently active requests; orders contains all the deleted or accepted requests; auth contains all the match of username and password
